title: LOCKDOWN ANNIVERSARY! Reviewing ALL the Lies and the Liars Who Told Them!
description:
Happy anniversary! It’s one year since Americans were told “15 days to flatten the curve,” and we’re taking a look back. We’ll cover what we were told then and figure out what turned out to be true. HINT: Not much. It’s a party! No masks or social distancing necessary.

Use promo code WrongAboutEverything for $20 off your annual MugClub subscription! Go to: http://louderwithcrowder.com/mugclub​

GET TODAY'S SHOW NOTES with SOURCES: https://www.louderwithcrowder.com/show-notes-flatten-the-curve
